Aligator.description: Aligators can grow up to 46 feet in length, but they always start out as babies fresh from the egg. Our aligators are farm-raised and have been genetically enhanced to eat only grass and burglars - perfect for the whole family!

Computer.description: Conventionally, a computer consists of at least one processing element, typically a central processing unit (CPU), and some form of memory. Since a sequence of operations can be readily changed, the computer can solve more than one kind of problem.
